Label: Quantity on hand
Description: The quantity of stock on hand and available to fulfill new orders. Either <StockQuantityCoded> or <OnHand> is mandatory in each occurrence of the <Stock> composite, even if the quantity on hand is zero. Non-repeating.
Format: <dd>Positive or negative integer or zero, suggested maximum length 7 digits. Negative numbers indicate order commitments in excess of the copies on hand for which no further stock has been ordered</dd>
